website_summaries.verdict: For cat lovers, Princess Pottymouth represents the dual nature of their favorite pet very well. The feisty face is scary, but not too over-the-top for younger children.
pros: Retains its plush doll appeal in resting face mode
Appeals to younger children as a protector
Conversion to feisty face is very easy and effective
cons: Relatively expensive for a plush toy
Construction issues, including weak seams and minimal stuffing

customer_reviews.title: Best unnecessary purchase I've made
customer_reviews.text: As an adult I debated this purchase because spending $20 on a stuffed novelty item is not something a responsible 30-something would do. Well guess what? I'm not responsible and this was totally worth it! Snapchat filters work on it, it looks scary especially in black and white, my cats are amusingly confused by it, my niece and nephew love it, my coworkers were amused by it... I have nothing negative to say. If you're a responsible adult and can't justify why you'd spend $20 on a stuffed animal for yourself- instead of spending $40 going out for dinner and drinks buy this and stay in one night with ramen and a 6 pack. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Little minds = blown
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nieces and nephew for their birthdays this year and they were a HUGE hit! (Nephew = 9yo, Nieces = 8yo & 7yo) Only 4 stars because they feel kinda cheap. My 7yo niece broke hers the first day but my mom was able to wiggle around the pieces and fix it. As their favorite aunt it's my job to find them the coolest - sometimes weirdest - toys and let's just say that Christmas will be a challenge because these blew their little minds.
customer_reviews.author: carmen311

customer_reviews.title: Purrr-fect!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this little kitty! My ma got it for me as a birthday present. I have a kitty that's orange and has her feisty moments as well. Either way, I love both of them! As for the plush itself, it's very well made. I would, personally, recommend it for children 12+ for the average child or 6+ if they don't mint semi-creepy things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye fell out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this feisty cat. It's hilarious. Sadly the eye fell out 2 weeks after Christmas. I'm not sure if I can exchange it, but we had to give it an eyepatch in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Modigliani

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Some find this toy freaky, I love it and so does my almost 5 year old. He is sensative and gets scared easily. He says his Feisty Pet will protect him from scary things and it's worked. He had recently developed a bad habit where he needed me to stay with him until he fell asleep, after getting this kitty he just needs a few cuddles and then he falls asleep on his own again. Glad we got this and we have the others on his birthday wish list, the silly ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks a bit on feisty
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, unfortunately it does not go back to its normal friendly face without help. It kind of gets stuck and you have to close its mouth. It's easy enough to press for feisty pet. I believe we may just have gotten one that is not quite right. I have it two stars because it is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Im having to sew up a hole in this... 😢😢
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Valentine's Day because he has been begging for one since he seen it in a youtube video... He was very heartbroken when he picked it up and discovered a hole near its back leg... We will be attempting to sew it ourselves because I know mailing back will just be a bigger headache since we dont own a printer to print a label... I really expected better quality out of these and had planned on buying more but I dont know if its worth the price now.... 😢😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Charla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Feisty Pet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I gifted this to our son on Christmas morning and he absolutely loved it (like running around the living room ecstatic over it). We were met with watery eyes from the tears of joy and excitement and constant OMG’s. So I think it’s safe to say that it’s a Win-Win and definitely worth the purchase. Thank you very much to Amazon for their amazingly fast shipping speed and for their Customer Service and thank you very much to the seller/supplier for providing such a wonderful quality product. It really made our child’s Christmas extra special.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: super disappointed in this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of them, super disappointed in this one. poor quality. The neck gears/spring are clearly visible, as the guard and fabric do not cover it. Because it is wide open, it's also a hazard as kids can stick their fingers inside and be injured. Not satisfied at all. :(
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Mouth sticks in open position
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. We also bought the monkey, dog, and the Christmas teddy bear. Unfortunately the mouth on this one sticks in the open position every time you squeeze it and you have to close it manually. Sending this one back and have reordered another one, hopefully it will work as advertised. As for the toy itself, the kitty is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: It was very cute and very funny! Quality seemed good
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying it after seeing old reviews on the quality, but they were older reviews so I was hoping maybe they made improvements. I bought it as a gift but played with it several times before wrapping it up. It was very cute and very funny! Quality seemed good, no issues. the mouth and eyes worked great and very easy to manipulate. As far as I know its still working fine. Looks better then the picture too! I would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: You scared cat!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Just like my cat goes from nice to naughty and quick! The fur is super soft and shiney! Very nice way the buttons push together to make the naughty face easy for children and anyone with lesser hand strength. A very fun and unique gift for all.
customer_reviews.author: Ni Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious, for all ages!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Someone sent me a FB video of them and I immediately looked them up. I am very happy with this purchase and will probably buy more for my neices! This one's all mine! Grrrr
customer_reviews.author: firehawk

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's in love with this psycho cat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 1/2 year old daughter for the holidays and it is one of her favorite presents! She loves Hello Kitty and also loves scary Halloween stuff so I knew this would be right up her alley! She takes it everywhere and the "surprise" never gets old! I was a little concerned at first because the way it is packaged the fur gets squished in transit and you see all the seams, but once you give it a good fluffover it's fine. It is an unusual gift that keeps my daughter smiling!
customer_reviews.author: Joshdent

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't much to say! Product came exactly as described! My daughter has been begging me to get her one so here we are! Shipping was fast, product came packaged nicely so it wouldn't break in transit, and works perfectly! Although my daughter thinks she is hilarious "scaring" everyone with it! If you are looking to buy one of these feisty pets, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my Son for Easter. 2 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Son for Easter. 2 days later the stitching in back is gone and now the eye sockets are visible. My son loves this toy, but it is very poorly made and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fitzgibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES feisty pets! She played with this thing forevever, then she left it lay on the couch and our great dane got it and tore it up. She knows now not to leave things laying around!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our daughter for her 5th birthday. She loves cats and has cute orange cat stuffy she got as a baby. Since she has a weird sense of humor, I thought she would love an evil version and she does. She thinks its hilarious and she loves to shock people when she turns her kitty from "cute" to "scary".
customer_reviews.author: TheLeeFamily

customer_reviews.title: Aww - cute kitty - OH WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Aww - what a cute kitty. Wait! What's that? Holy $^%#! Oh, that's hysterical! This kitty gave me the giggles, and it caused quite a bit of laughter at work too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly.. until the teeth come out. kind of like my ex....
customer_reviews.text: This thing cracks me up! I bought it for a Christmas present for my roommate's 10 year old daughter. It seemed like a perfect fit - her daughter is small and cute but with a grizzly bear attitude. This cuddly little kitty is the perfect gift! Seriously - it was like her spirit animal or something. Cute and sweet... until you squeeze it, then the teeth come out. I may buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Rip in paw
customer_reviews.text: This Feisty pet is absolutely fun and adorable, however, there was a rip in the paw upon opening. This was purchased as a gift and I don't have time to send back for a new one so I will be sewing it myself. But it's noticeable. This rip is the only flaw, otherwise it would have been 5 stars. You can't just ship damaged items.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week. It no longer opens the mouth, not worth it, I feel. If it didn't break so quick and easily it would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are great and are hands down my kids favorite toys! It even inspired them to get out all their old toys toor so they could use their Feisty Pets as hero's! It really refreshed their interest in play over tech items! Well made all the way around! Really made to be played with! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Vapor

customer_reviews.title: Really small!
customer_reviews.text: Cute but really small. Guess I should have read the description better. The video makes it look like a decent sized stuffed animal, but it’s not much bigger than my hand. It’s like a mini stuffy. I think it’s priced way too high for the size.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Okay toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a funny gag gift for kids. My 3 year old loves it. However, it is cheaply made. He’s had it for less than a month and the first is wearing off in several places
customer_reviews.author: Liz Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!! Hit of the birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy as a gift for an 8 year old girl I babysit. Although some children might be frightened, this little girl LOVED it and it was the hit of the party. I think the adults even wante one! She ran around giggling and scaring all of the adults with it for hours. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Loreen Clark

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this because we saw a video from a friend with one. It is so cute! Even I love it. My son is 6 and loves cats. I thought he would get bored of this but he still carries this around with him. Not super soft so it isn’t a cuddle toy.
customer_reviews.author: Carbonated Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very comical and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for adults and children. This is a travel buddy. Helps to break up monotonous highway travel
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, hilarious and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This just may be the cutest little stuffed animal ever! The fur is quite soft, and the details are well defined. I LOVE the feisty face it makes when you squeeze the back of the head. I bought 2 of these as Christmas gifts this year for my niece. She makes the same faces... so I just know she is going to love them! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Benephanie

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun scare toy
customer_reviews.text: Really works and looks very scary. I thought it might look cheap and not believable but it is appealing and realistically cute. This toy has made me laugh harder than any other. The kids, aged 6-19 loved it. Hit of Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Susan Randlett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, this is what my grandson wanted. I love these stuffed animals and the kids think they are hilarious. Very fast shipping and good quality. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a cat who looked just like this and would be sweet and out of no where bite you. I just love it. I bought this for myself and two other kinds of Feisty Pets for my older kids for Christmas. A great gift for all ages. Everyone gets a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: E.E

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister-in-law and she found it hilarious! I love that it looks all sweet and innocent, then you squeeze, and the angry face comes out! I got her the orange colored one because she has two orange tabbies. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: K. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but had to sew it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it but was disappointed that back of head was not sewed shut! I had to sew it then it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giggles for hours
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is currently obsessed with Cats, and this toy was a HIT!! Not only for her, but I found myself playing with it before wrapping. People who see her with it have two types of reactions, they love it and want more information about it or go "OH MY GOD WHY WOULD YOU LET YOUR DAUGHTER HAVE SUCH A TOY?!" Well she loves it and that makes this momma happy.
customer_reviews.author: S French

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted my daughter to love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this toy a 5/5 because I thought it was the coolest stuffed animal I've ever seen... Unfortunately is freaked my daughter out. What can I say, kids stink!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great joke gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend and she loves it. I told her that this one will imitate her live cat when she tries to give it it's medicine. She agreed. Not your usual plush animal and as such I would not recommend it for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Funny!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! Bought this as a gaga gift for a 14 year old with a mean cat, she got a kick out of it. Now i show it to little ones when they visit and they all think it's very funny and want to take it home with them.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Cats are Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 12/15 /18 These are so cute 🐱💕 I bought one for my mom for Christmas she love .
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: she loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to get this for his friend as part of her birthday present. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Yowpa

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious delight
customer_reviews.text: You can really scare a lot of people with this. People say, "oh so cute", and you say "want to pet her?" and then when they reach in to pet you hiss loudly and flip kitty into kill mode.
customer_reviews.author: space kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Hahahaha! Everyone needs this!
customer_reviews.text: Hahahahahahahahahaha! EPIC! Who thought of this?! I expected it to be kind of rinky-dink, but it's actually pretty structurally sound and loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Its more of a 3. 5 but can't rate ...
customer_reviews.text: Its more of a 3.5 but can't rate that so gave it a 4. Its soft and cuddly! The teeth are actually kind of sharp and hard so that was a little bit of a surprise. I got the Cat as a gift for a friend who has a cat that changes moods really quickly. It really does freak people out the first time they see it as you never thing a stuffed animal can get that mean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMGOSH it’s so cute AND vicious looking
customer_reviews.text: My step daughter was very pleased with her new fiesta cat. The fur is soft, and the mechanism that you squeeze on the back of its head works smoothly and easily. We like how the entire facial expression changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty hard on their toys and this hasn't broken yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old niece, she thinks it's hilarious and so do her 4 and 5 year old sisters! They are pretty hard on their toys and this hasn't broken yet, so it was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are hilarious! We bought the sloth version for a white elephant party and each person it got passed to imitated its face as they squeezed its head 😂 so funny to watch everyone's reactions to it. Afterward, I bought the tabby cat for my dad and he couldn't stop grinning from ear to ear. He's excited to play with it with their little yorkie 😂
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love the cat..funny when you squeeze its chicks and it makes that scary face...it was worth buying
customer_reviews.author: witty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this cool little transforming stuffed toy -- and so does every kid that picks it up. Price was decent.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cute to Evil with a Squeeze
customer_reviews.text: I love the cute kitty stuffed animal and the ability to surprise my friends and family with being able to change cute to evil by squeezing at the base of the animal's head. I have lots of fun with this toy. No batteries are required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and funny toy! We love it! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought for daughter and we love it. Built well for the money, works perfectly. Be careful as you can cause little ones (6 and below) to cry. (Lol). Fun and funny!
customer_reviews.author: DAD of 4 Daughters :)

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy
customer_reviews.text: The mouth mechanism on this toy functions only half the time and being that's whole point kids wanted this particular toy I give it a one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jcall55

customer_reviews.title: Clever Toy
customer_reviews.text: A really funny, unique idea. It's either really cute or really scary. I'm not sure how long this little guy will last with my kids, but so far it's holding up. It seems like the cloth around the mouth may come undone easily, but I will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: GuinnessChris

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but quality should be better
customer_reviews.text: I love this, just wish it had arrived in better condition. There are lots of loose strings and areas where the "fur" is coming unglued. It arrived that way, not from wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, otherwise funny.
customer_reviews.text: Product had seams showing the sewn thread, tags of glue and generally not well manufactured. The toy is hilarious and a fun gag gift, just not for the price based on the build quality. Also, the mouth started getting stuck in the open and partially open positions after less than 5 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mongeon

customer_reviews.title: Dog got revenge
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 2 yo daughter as a Christmas gift since she is obsessed with kitties right now. Her reaction was priceless! I taunted my dog a few times, and the very next day I discover that he pulled all of the fur out from between the poor kitty's eyes. I always suspected he was secretly evil, but now I'm sure of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.M

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a White Elephant Gift trade and it was a total hit... probably NOT for young children though.
customer_reviews.author: glevan

customer_reviews.title: early Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece was craving for one of these, it's been 2 months since I gifted it away and the quality is still good!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: Cool but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this 5 stars. My daughter loves it and the sweet to scary face to fun to surprise people with; however, after 3 days of light play the seam split. Instead of going through the hassle of returning it I just sewed it, but I would have expected it to be a little more rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick D Caputo

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a dumb idea. But it's actually really cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used her birthday money to buy this. I thought it was a dumb idea. But it's actually really cute. She likes to take her cat out and about and "scare" people. Most of them get a good laugh out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Sydel

customer_reviews.title: What a stupid toy my granddaughter played fo what a stupid toy ...
customer_reviews.text: What a stupid toy my granddaughter played fo what a stupid toy my granddaughter played with it for about two minutes and then she threw in the corner she’s never picked it up since!Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for 6 year old daughter and while it was fun to see cats face change
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 6 year old daughter and while it was fun to see cats face change, her hand got tired of squeezing the head to change the face. ( after only 4x) tiring for your hand.
customer_reviews.author: new mother

customer_reviews.title: Really fun. I got this for my 6 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. I got this for my 6 year old niece as she's on a kick of trying to scare everyone. She loves it. Pretty sure my husband found it equally entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Katy W

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the quality wasn’t as good as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the quality wasn’t as good as I had hoped. The fur came out near the seams and is obviously poor quality. I would still buy again but, don’t expect exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baker

customer_reviews.title: funny
customer_reviews.text: hilarious! great for gifts! wished it was cheaper than $20 though, it’s a bit small
customer_reviews.author: Misaki

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These crack me up!!! I can’t get enough. Looking forward to giving them to my daughters as Christmas presents. Hoping they’ll work to scare off “monsters in the closet.”
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for this little devil in disguise
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 3 year old niece and just as expected she runs around the house trying to scare her older brothers. Perfect gift for this little devil in disguise.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Guill

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.text: Works Wonders on family and friends. The Star of the show. Just be careful...face color can be rubbed off, I had to color it back up, and its not made to be a fluffy cat, its made to make people jump. Does its Job.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my feisty girl
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Squeeze the back of head to change face. You can control how much feisty you're going for by how hard you squeeze. Nice quality. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The face breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: after one day my 13 year old brings this to me showing me that the face is stuck between nice and feisty. It doesn’t want to change when u squeeze it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool!! My son loved it. Even adults like it. It actually scared my cat! I think it's a great gift for kids that like to prank people.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: my nine year old daughter LOVED it- all the cousins laughed including the four year ...
customer_reviews.text: my nine year old daughter LOVED it- all the cousins laughed including the four year old. It might be scary for some kids but it was perfect for mine
customer_reviews.author: pokemom

customer_reviews.title: Great gag gift or toy
customer_reviews.text: My kid found these from a YouTube video so we ordered and it’s hilarious and perfect. He is very happy
customer_reviews.author: bostnrulz

customer_reviews.title: We loved them, these were Christmas presents and as of ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved them, these were Christmas presents and as of today they are still standing. These critters are made very well
customer_reviews.author: Manie Mar

customer_reviews.title: Good for many laughs!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great! My son loves it and everyone thinks it’s hilarious:)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my gosh!!! So stinking cute!!! My daughter will love this!!! Such a great stuffed animal!! Lots bigger than I expected, which is nice!!! Shipped fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! I have it in my office
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I have it in my office. It's a good way to answer people without having to speak or look at them :)
customer_reviews.author: SMAsh

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cute but it's very poorly made! I read reviews and thought maybe it would be ok but definitely not a toy I could give as an actual present! Not worth sending back but beware of the poor quality review!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like whats advertised
customer_reviews.text: Hate.. not it appears to be it just sticks its tongue out.. and not the color suggested
customer_reviews.author: JessA

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long but fun toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the greatest quality toy-the fur was falling out as soon as I unpacked it. But my 6 year old nephew loves it...so it’s worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Luke S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it...bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a Christmas present for my son, he doesn't understand that there's a button in the back. He says it looks like a demon every time I pick it up!!!! Best gag gift ever....Priceless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly neat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old daughter. She & everyone else absolutely loved it. It's a bit smaller than i thought it would be, but not disappointingly small. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Isy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nine year old grand-daughter and she loves it as well as her three year old brother
customer_reviews.author: Jkirby327

customer_reviews.title: Great granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My great granddaughter loves the cat. She carries it everywhere when she is at my house. She was not afraid of it at all.
customer_reviews.author: dixiespots

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. We always have fun showing this to unsuspecting friends.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift and my daughter loves it. Princess potty mouth is always up to no good. Sometimes she puts crackers in her mouth and sometimes she sips soda
customer_reviews.author: ClARi

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a week
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty cool for the first week until the eyeball popped out just from my kids nicely playing with it the way it was meant to be played with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the feisty pets
customer_reviews.text: Love the feisty pets. These are so fun to surprise unsuspecting people with. Soft and cute...until you squeeze them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N. Mills

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite toy he actually cries when it’s not mad 😂 love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bruno

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, baby hates it. Seems to be for older kids
customer_reviews.author: Britny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Funny but pricey
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says. Its nice to receive a product that looks and functions exactly how it does on the commercial or in the picture. Its been a hit among friends and family...and even our pets. I gave it 3 stars though because the price point of $40 for simple squeezable stuffed animal is ridiculous.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitty,  angry kitty!

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got his for my niece's birthday. It came in right on time and it's hilarious! My 12 year old son couldn't put it down. It was a huge hit with her and all of the children (and adults) at the party! My son wants one for himself.... Christmas is coming🤔🤔🤔🤔
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

product_meta.title: Feisty Pets Princess Pottymouth Adorable Plush Stuffed Cat that Turns Feisty with a Squeeze
feature_bullets: This charismatic kitty is only 8" tall- but don't let the princess know that- unless you wanna see the feisty side of this pet
Turn your sweet and innocent looking stuffed animal into a feisty pet by giving it a little squeeze behind the ears
These pets have an endearing resting face and are great for cuddle time-and their animated alter ego is fun for play and to give your friends
Stuffed with polyester fibers and surface is washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars729 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
